alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:24PM CDT until June 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BREWSTER COUNTY... At 923 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Persimmon Gap, or 14 miles northeast of Panther Junction, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Persimmon Gap Mesonet station reported a 59 mph gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Boquillas Canyon and Big Bend National Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
